intro.p: This node provides the start of a timing block for monitoring performance of a node or nodes. It needs to be paired with a corresponding Performance Monitoring Timing End node.
The loop start allows the setting of a number of timing runs, and an optional timeout
NB The timeout will not halt intermediate node execution, only prevent a new iteration starting one the corresponding loop end is reached.
